scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run create && npm run bower && npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:tmp && npm run create:dist
scripts.create: npm run create:tmp && npm run create:dist && npm run create:docs:dist
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
scripts.docs: npm run docs:kss && npm run copy && npm run docs:styles:less
scripts.create:dist: npm run create:dist:images && npm run create:dist:fonts && npm run create:dist:favicons
scripts.build:styles: lessc style.less > dist/style.min.css --global-var="bower_dir='lib/bower_components/'" --autoprefix="last 2 versions, Firefox >= 31, ie >= 9, Android >= 4.1, iOS >= 8" --clean-css
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:scripts:jshint && npm run build:scripts:browserify && npm run build:scripts:uglify
scripts.docs:styles:less: lessc --verbose docs/public/kss.less docs/public/kss.css --clean-css && lessc --verbose docs/public/markdown.less docs/public/markdown.css --clean-css
scripts.copy: npm run copy:dist && npm run copy:docs
scripts.copy:dist: npm run create:dist && npm run copy:dist:images && npm run copy:dist:fonts && npm run copy:dist:favicons
scripts.copy:dist:images: npm run copy:dist:images:header && npm run copy:dist:images:footer && npm run copy:dist:images:featured
scripts.copy:docs: npm run copy:docs:dist && npm run copy:docs:libs
